answers.answer: Is the focus problem for near only.  It is possible that you simply need reading glasses.  If you have diabetes, you need a complete eye exam at least once a year.  If it has been more than a few months, go in for an exam with an ophthalmologist.  Very important to keep your blood sugar down to prevent long-term problems in your eyes from the diabetes.HV

question: I've recently noticed that I have to concentrate in order to focus my eyes on something and also to keep  my focus.If I don't purposely focus my eyes, they get blurry. Is this normal? I should let you know that I am a diabetic for 11 years now.
title: My eyes focus
